This book is a work in progress. I invite y’all to contribute and collaborate with me on creating this book. You can submit an issue on Github or jump over into the Google Docs and start commenting right away. Thank you so much and happy reading!

Sign up for the newsletter if you want to stay up to date on the book release.

This book is personal and does not represent IBM’s positions, strategies or opinions.

by Sammy Schuckert
